attributes.action: Review the public sector pay awards which amounts to a real term pay cut, and ensure that the full award is paid from April 2007 and not staged which devalues the independence of the Pay review bodys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK inflation has accelerated to its highest level for almost 10 years, yet most public sector workers have been offered a pay rise that equates to a pay cut.This is at a time when public sector workers are expected to innovative and improve services as part of the governments modernisation agenda. However again this government fails to recognise the huge contribution public sector workers are making to service improvement by giving a unsatisfactory and staged increase
